pageContext.claim: “Look, you have some of the most serious horrible rapists and everything else. They don't go to jail for nine years.”
pageContext.analysis: A 1995 study from the Bureau of Justice Statistics found the average rape sentence was 9.8 years. A 2012 estimate found the average amount of time served for rape is between six and seven years — but that is the average amount. Presumably, the “most serious horrible rapists” receive longer sentences.
